item.title: My Third Post using Visual Studio Code
item.description: This is the second This is the third post does this behave like mark up? Thinking about making a Beatle’s site I want to add all of the PDFs Once I do that I want to have them organized by title and album Here is how to make a table Disk 0 Disk 1 Disk 2 Disk 3 A1 A2 A3 Ap(1-3) A4 A5 A6 Ap(4-6) B1 B2 B3 Bp(1-3) B4 B5 B6 Bp(4-6) Link: Text
